item.title: 317 Client Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

so in your case it would be…

@echo off COLOR 08 title Compiler "G:/_Rubin/Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

make sure you change the version of JDK to your version, Like mines jdk1.6.0_12

change it to yours.
Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Client Compiler
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

This is what mine looks like:

@echo off @TITLE jeffrey ownt if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Some friend sended it to me and I have to get it working O.o
When I run it it says I don’t have java installed, while I’m sure I do have java installed. Does anyone know how to change it to make it work? any idea’s?

Read full topic
